column1: Ambositra [amˈbusʲʈʂə̥] is a city (commune urbaine) in central Madagascar.
Ambositra is the capital of the Amoron'i Mania region
It is the centre of Madagascar's' wood-carving industry due to the presence of the Zafimaniry tribe
column2: a subgroup of the Betsileo tribe. There are many shops selling wooden boxes

column1: The Diocese of Ambositra is seated in the town (Cathedral of the Immaculate Heart of Mary)
A regional centre for distance education (CRTE) of the Centre National de Télé-Enseignement de Madagascar (CNETMAD) is located in Ambositra.
